title: Stylish Zengcheng Urban Sanctuary with Two Restaurants & Indoor Pool
description:
Step into the heart of Zengcheng, Guangzhou’s famed 'hometown of litchi', with a stay at this modern Hyatt retreat that blends sleek design with rich Lingnan heritage. Spend your days unwinding with a swim in the heated indoor pool, recharge at the 24-hour gym, or enjoy a quiet afternoon tea in the relaxed lounge.

At Xiang Yue, indulge in the bold, refined flavours of Cantonese and Chaozhou cuisine prepared in vibrant open kitchens, or explore global fare at Market Cafe. Just beyond, discover the Zengcheng Lychee Culture Village and take a stroll through the orchards. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, this hotel is your elegant gateway to Guangzhou’s eastern charm.
offer_address: 8 Chuangxiang Road, Xintangzhen, Zengcheng District, Guangzhou 511340, China
